inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male or female >18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum HCV RNA levels of >1,000 IU per milliliter or higher
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Chronic Hepatitis C based on the judgment of the investigator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All women of child-bearing potential who take ribavirin will need to have a negative urine pregnancy test
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Decompensated liver disease in which pegylated interferon is contraindicated.
exclusion.label: not_met
